cause.description:
The United State of America was founded on principles of liberty and justice. Our government was meant be representative of all, yet more and more we are becoming some what of an oligarchy. It is important to raise awareness. It is hard to change anything, but when people do not listen it is impossible. At the base of this operation we need to let others see the truth and start our trail to a better America.
1. We must raise awareness about the denegration of America's political and social system.
2. We must rectify America's image and build her back into her place as a land of liberty.
3. The truth must be known now, so there can be a tommorow
cause.mission: perserve America's liberty and protect our governmnet from virtual dictatorship
cause.name: Protect America
